fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Spread Disease to a target of your choice in the night, silencing them in the following day.
- Kill all players who currently have the Disease.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Disease effect will last indefinitely after it is inflicted, unless purged.
- Your victims will not know they have been diseased.
- While Empowered, you are allowed to use both of your abilities each night. Otherwise, you are limited to one.
- Conversion and Chat-Impairment Immune.
